dmca.title: Copyright Infringement/Resale of Manuals
dmca.body:
Dear Seller:

We have reviewed your auction posted at eBay in which you have offered for sale, or have sold, copies of Sybase's proprietary
software. 

Please be advised that the Sybase Software License Agreement prohibits the transfer of any Sybase Software license (under the
Agreement, Sybase grants the licensee a nontransferable license) and thus even legitimate copies of the software may not generally
be sold or otherwise transferred.  Should you believe you have in fact been granted the authority by Sybase to sell these or that
your offering does not infringe our intellectual property, please respond with a specific description and documentation.

Sybase views the unauthorized transfer of its proprietary software products very seriously and is prepared to pursue legal remedies
to protect its intellectual property.  However, Sybase will forego further action, provided you immediately cease all attempts to
sell any Sybase software product(s).  If we discover more activity of this sort, we will immediately seek to have your account
barred from e-Bay permanently, and this matter will be referred to our Legal Department.

If you have any questions, please contact me at [redacted] or schrist@sybase.com.

Yours truly,

[redacted]
Associate Compliance Officer
Sybase, Inc.

--------------------

[redacted]
